abstract: "How many things do we have to go through before we get our lives back?"
description: Lynda Code recalls the hardships of living through the Gippsland bushfires then having to cope with devastating floods. Her story of resiliance is a tribute to her family, who have battled along with her. This Digital Storytelling project was created  in partnership with Arts Victoria and Latrobe City.
